data.name: Gear Out
data.description:
Explore the environments, find the gears and solve the puzzles to escape. 
Gear Out is a tense and immersive interactive escape-room puzzle game. You must search for gears, interact with obstacles and arrange the gears on spindles to open the door to the next level. But beware, youâ€™re not always in there alone.
There are 26 levels of increasing difficulty. Some have time limits, some have additional challenges. Each level can be randomized to produce up to 9,999 variants of the puzzle for extended play time.
Playable from seated, standing or room scale environments. Also playable with either one or both controllers.

changelog.change_log:
New textures throughout cave levels for added realism,
Improved teleporting locator
Adjusted walking speed (click joystick down for run speed)

Added controller preferences on first start up.
Made distance placement of gears a little easier
Fixed a couple of minor potential issues.
Improved gear placement system to make it easier to place multiple gears (such as one in each hand) at the same time.

V1.16
Added restart level function to in-game control panel.
Added player run function - click the movement thumbstick down to toggle
Found and fixed issue with catching distance grabbed gears
Added better handling of distance grab cancelled mid flight.
Shortened the pause time waiting for distance grab
Also allowed the player to press trigger after pressing grab to immediately distance grab
Reduced the frequency of the skeleton in Level 8 appearing.
Reduced bat sound effects
Improved Hammer dynamics
Added Sound Effects where hammer hits the drawers
